name: Aerial Outcast
description:
Travel through the world of Oloinia as Haiden or Hailey and go on a quest to save the other sibling from a mysterious woman. With the help of Lisnia, a long time friend of the twins, Sayu, a messenger from Learin , as well as many other new friends along the way, you're sure to succeed.

7 playable characters, 10 sidequests and a small world to explore in a top-down, retro-style, turn-based RPG.

WARNING: FLASHING LIGHTS, SCREEN SHAKING
